title: AI-Utilized Research Writing Workshop for Prospective Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science education theories and research methodologies, with basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Systematic learning process for aspiring science teachers to write research papers using AI tools, with simulated classroom experience in virtual environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize AI-driven smart prompt design strategies to select research topics and conduct literature reviews.
Learners can implement experimental design and data interpretation processes in a simulated environment using tools such as ChatGPT and Perplexity AI.
Learners can cultivate the ability to critically assess and revise AI-generated content according to academic writing standards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
